extracted-table.table-caption: Characteristics of respondents by income group and by location (Famy and Sta Maria, Laguna, Philippines).
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Note: Figures presented here are means and standard deviations (in parentheses). The conversion rate at the time of the study (September to December 2012) was 1 USD = 41.12 PHP.

fn.p: Note: Figures presented here are means and standard deviations (in parentheses). The conversion rate at the time of the study (September to December 2012) was 1 USD = 41.12 PHP.

extracted-table.table-caption: Physical, cooking, and eating quality indicators of rice samples obtained from respondents by income class.
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: a Figures presented here are means and standard deviations (in parentheses). For peak time, a different lowercase letter beside each mean indicates that the means are significantly different (α = 0.05).b The conversion rate at the time of the study (November 2012) was 1 USD = 41.12 PHP.c The letter beside the p-value indicates the test statistic used: (A) ANOVA (F-statistic), (B) Kruskal-Wallis rank sum test (χ2).

caption.title: Physical, cooking, and eating quality indicators of rice samples obtained from respondents by income class.

fn.p: a Figures presented here are means and standard deviations (in parentheses). For peak time, a different lowercase letter beside each mean indicates that the means are significantly different (α = 0.05).
b The conversion rate at the time of the study (November 2012) was 1 USD = 41.12 PHP.
c The letter beside the p-value indicates the test statistic used: (A) ANOVA (F-statistic), (B) Kruskal-Wallis rank sum test (χ2).

extracted-table.table-caption: Comparison of physical, cooking, and eating quality indicators of rice samples obtained from respondents by location (Famy and Sta Maria, Laguna, Philippines) using the Z-test.
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Note: Values presented are means and standard deviations (in parentheses).At p < 0.05, attributes with Z < -1.96 or Z > 1.96 are significantly different between the locations.

caption.title: Comparison of physical, cooking, and eating quality indicators of rice samples obtained from respondents by location (Famy and Sta Maria, Laguna, Philippines) using the Z-test.

fn.p: Note: Values presented are means and standard deviations (in parentheses).
At p < 0.05, attributes with Z < -1.96 or Z > 1.96 are significantly different between the locations.
